A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I had no emotional connection to this movie and I was stuck considering plot holes and nonsensical narrative choices. I find it odd that people like this movie as nobody in my packed theater was laughing at the jokes\, reacting to the action\, or responded to the ending. I heard some people start to react to what they thought might happen only to have the plot twist contradict their expectations.\n\nImportant note: Nothing in the movie will make any sense if you don't already have a strong grasp of the Star Wars storyline.
